oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Henry Doubleday Research Association (HDRA): Long-term crop experiments/ field studies
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Breeding, genetics and propagation
Vegetables
Crop husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Hunts Mill Warwick HRI Wellesbourne – 13 hectares, since 1996, investigating the performance of three cropping strategies contrasting in terms of cropping and fertility building regimes (vegetable/arable systems).
Organic Unit Warwick HRI Kirton – 3.2 hectares, since 1997, investigating the performance of a field vegetable cropping strategy (DEFRA).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Facility} HDRA: Henry Doubleday Research Association (HDRA): Long-term crop experiments/ field studies. Facility Leader(s): Rayns, F and Collier, R, Henry Doubleday Research Association.
